languages.text: "Мы перехватили несколько передач касательно сложной ситуации на нижних уровнях города. Описания весьма... неясные, однако упомянутый квартал уже как несколько месяцев в полной изоляции от остального поселения. Поговаривают о каком-то культе, из которого никто не возвращается".

"We intercepted a handful of transmissions reporting a difficult situation on the lower levels of the city. The descriptions are most... vague, but the aforementioned district has already been fully isolated from the rest of the settlement for a few months. There are rumours of some cult from which nobody has ever returned."
languages.original_text: "Мы перехватили несколько передач касательно сложной ситуации на нижних уровнях города. Описания весьма... неясные, однако упомянутый квартал уже как несколько месяцев в полной изоляции от остального поселения. Поговаривают о каком-то культе, из которого никто не возвращается".

traits.locale_text: "We intercepted a handful of transmissions reporting a difficult situation at the lower levels of the city. The descriptions are most... vague, but the mentioned district has been fully isolated from the rest of the settlement for a few months already. There are rumours of some cult that nobody ever returns from."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "We intercepted a handful of transmissions reporting a difficult situation at the lower levels of the city. The descriptions are most... vague, but the mentioned district has been fully isolated from the rest of the settlement for a few months already. There are rumours of some cult that nobody ever returns from."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "We intercepted a handful of transmissions reporting a difficult situation on the lower levels of the city. The descriptions are most... vague, but the aforementioned district has already been fully isolated from the rest of the settlement for a few months. There are rumours of some cult from which nobody has ever returned."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Nous avons intercepté des transmissions faisant état d'une situation critique dans les niveaux inférieurs de la ville. Les détails sont pour le moins... vagues, mais le quartier touché a déjà été placé en confinement total pour quelques mois. Le bruit court qu'une secte y a élu domicile, et que tous ceux qui l'ont rejointe n'en sont jamais revenus. »
languages.original_text: "We intercepted a handful of transmissions reporting a difficult situation on the lower levels of the city. The descriptions are most... vague, but the aforementioned district has already been fully isolated from the rest of the settlement for a few months. There are rumours of some cult from which nobody has ever returned."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons intercepté des transmissions faisant état d'une situation critique dans les niveaux inférieurs de la ville. Les détails sont pour le moins... vagues, mais le quartier touché a déjà été placé en confinement total pour quelques mois. Le bruit court qu'une secte y a élu domicile, et que tous ceux qui l'ont rejointe n'en sont jamais revenus. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “我们截获了一部分报告，其中提到了城市底层居民生活困难。报告中的描述非常……含糊，但出现问题的地区从几个月前，就已经与城市的其他区域完全隔离开了。有传言说，那些至今无人返回的地区发生了邪教事件。”
languages.original_text: "We intercepted a handful of transmissions reporting a difficult situation on the lower levels of the city. The descriptions are most... vague, but the aforementioned district has already been fully isolated from the rest of the settlement for a few months. There are rumours of some cult from which nobody has ever returned."

traits.locale_text: “我们截获了一部分报告，其中提到了城市底层居民生活困难。报告中的描述非常……含糊，但出现问题的地区从几个月前，就已经与城市的其他区域完全隔离开了。有传言说，那些至今无人返回的地区发生了邪教事件。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Wir haben eine Handvoll von Übertragungen abgefangen, die von einer schwierigen Lage in den unteren Ebenen der Stadt berichten. Die Beschreibungen sind äußerst ... vage, doch der genannte Distrikt ist schon seit einigen Monaten vollständig vom Rest der Siedlung isoliert. Es gab Gerüchte über einen Kult, von dem nie jemand zurückkehrt."
languages.original_text: "We intercepted a handful of transmissions reporting a difficult situation on the lower levels of the city. The descriptions are most... vague, but the aforementioned district has already been fully isolated from the rest of the settlement for a few months. There are rumours of some cult from which nobody has ever returned."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben eine Handvoll von Übertragungen abgefangen, die von einer schwierigen Lage in den unteren Ebenen der Stadt berichten. Die Beschreibungen sind äußerst ... vage, doch der genannte Distrikt ist schon seit einigen Monaten vollständig vom Rest der Siedlung isoliert. Es gab Gerüchte über einen Kult, von dem nie jemand zurückkehrt."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Hemos interceptado una serie de transmisiones que avisan de la difícil situación de los niveles inferiores de la ciudad. La mayoría de las descripciones no son muy... precisas, pero dicho distrito ya lleva unos meses aislado del resto del asentamiento. Hay rumores de un culto del que nadie vuelve una vez dentro».
languages.original_text: "We intercepted a handful of transmissions reporting a difficult situation on the lower levels of the city. The descriptions are most... vague, but the aforementioned district has already been fully isolated from the rest of the settlement for a few months. There are rumours of some cult from which nobody has ever returned."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos interceptado una serie de transmisiones que avisan de la difícil situación de los niveles inferiores de la ciudad. La mayoría de las descripciones no son muy... precisas, pero dicho distrito ya lleva unos meses aislado del resto del asentamiento. Hay rumores de un culto del que nadie vuelve una vez dentro».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「街の下層部の難しい状況を報告する通信を数件傍受しました。話の内容はどうも…ハッキリしないのですが、当該地区は既にここ数か月間、他の居住区から完全に孤立しています。みんな行ったきり姿を消した、カルトの噂があるのです」
languages.original_text: "We intercepted a handful of transmissions reporting a difficult situation on the lower levels of the city. The descriptions are most... vague, but the aforementioned district has already been fully isolated from the rest of the settlement for a few months. There are rumours of some cult from which nobody has ever returned."

traits.locale_text: 「街の下層部の難しい状況を報告する通信を数件傍受しました。話の内容はどうも…ハッキリしないのですが、当該地区は既にここ数か月間、他の居住区から完全に孤立しています。みんな行ったきり姿を消した、カルトの噂があるのです」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Şehrin alt seviyelerindeki zorlu bir durum hakkında bazı iletiler aldık. Tanımlamalar oldukça... Muğlaktı ancak söz konusu semt, birkaç ay önce yerleşim yerinin kalanından tamamen tecrit edilmişti. Giden kimsenin geri dönmediği bir tarikata dair söylentiler mevcut."
languages.original_text: "We intercepted a handful of transmissions reporting a difficult situation on the lower levels of the city. The descriptions are most... vague, but the aforementioned district has already been fully isolated from the rest of the settlement for a few months. There are rumours of some cult from which nobody has ever returned."
